mapper.select: insert into tbl_freeboard(freeboard_num, user_num, freeboard_title, freeboard_content) value(#{freeboardNum}, #{userNum}, #{freeboardTitle}, #{freeboardContent});
mapper.update: update tbl_freeboard set freeboard_title = #{freeboardTitle}, freeboard_content = #{freeboardContent}, freeboard_writedate = #{freeboardWriteDate} where freeboard_num = #{freeboardNum};
mapper.select: select * from tbl_freeboard join tbl_user where freeboard_num = #{freeboardNum}
